alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Jack; Palo Pinto; Stephens; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Young, Eastland, Jack, Stephens and Palo Pinto Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 943 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Archer City to near Possum Kingdom State Park to near Cisco. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Graham, Breckenridge, Jacksboro, Eastland, Cisco, Olney, Ranger, Gorman, Rising Star, Graford, Bryson, Gordon, Palo Pinto, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Lake Cisco, Lake Leon, Possum Kingdom State Park, Gunsight and Lake Graham. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 363, and between mile markers 369 and 377. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastland; Jack; Palo Pinto; Stephens; Young
